|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Elpida;EDJ8416E6MB-GN-F; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/06/2021 |estreldate = 08/2022 |estprice = 27 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Trolink TL8723DS |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723DS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MANGOPI", "Card Computer", "MangoPi.CC" and "20220810 V1.1" :are silkscreened on the board bottom. "MQ-Quad" is silkscreened on the board top.
Should be capable of being used with [[RPF_Raspberry_Pi_Zero]] peripherals that make use of pogo-pin connectors.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] H616 @1.5GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-G31 MP2'' :supports OpenGL ES 1.0/2.0/3.2, OpenCL 2.0 *Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Memory: 1GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *WiFi: [[Realtek]] RTL8723DS :802.11bgn (1T1R), BT 4.2 BLE *USB: 2x USB 2.0 (Type-C) port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin connector *Power Source: 5V via USB Type-C, GPIO header or pogo pins
==Links of Interest== *[https://linux-sunxi.org/MangoPi_MQ-Quad ''MangoPi MQ-Quad'' on '''SunXi'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/mangopi-allwinner-based-sbc-available-for-27us/ ''MangoPi Allwinner H616 based SBC available for ~$27US'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/08/30/mangopi-mq-quad-sbc-allwinner-h616-raspberry-pi-zero-w/ ''MangoPi MQ Quad SBC'' on '''CNX|Software''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> Raspberry Pi CM4 Lite (CM4001000) Top.jpeg|Board Top Raspberry Pi CM4 Lite (CM4001000) Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
